theme.label: Ubwoko bw'amabara
theme.description: Hitamo uburyo bw'amabara y'urumuri cyangwa umwijima

rtl.label: RTL
rtl.description: Iyo yemejwe, interface izerekana icyerekezo cy'inyandiko uhereye iburyo ujya ibumoso

extAction.label: Gukanda ku gikorwa cya ikoni y'inyongera
extAction.description: Shyiraho igikorwa iyo ukanda ku ikoni y'inyongera
extAction.SmallWindowAlert: Niba uruhande rufata umwanya munini, birasabwa gukoresha idirishya rishya

SidePanelPosition.label: Umwanya w'uruhande
SidePanelPosition.description: Shyiraho niba uruhande rwerekanwa ibumoso cyangwa iburyo.

toolbar.label: Erekana ibikoresho
toolbar.moreOptionsDescription: Urashobora kugenzura ibimenyetso bigaragara kuri toolbar.

bottomNav.label: Erekana urubuga rwo hasi
bottomNav.description: Niba yemejwe, urubuga rwo hasi ruzagaragara
bottomNav.pinToToolbarReminder: Nyamuneka shyira iyi extention kuri toolbar yawe mbere yo gukuraho iyi navigasiyo.

alwaysShowCloseButton.label: Emeza gusa ikibonke kigufunga
alwaysShowCloseButton.description: Iyo yemejwe, ikibonke kigufunga kizerekana kuri bose; iyo itarabemejwe, ikibonke kigufunga kizerekana gusa iyo kibutoza ku kanya k'ikururira

fullScreenHideSidePanel.label: Hisha uruhande mu buryo bwuzuye
fullScreenHideSidePanel.description: Iyo yemejwe, uruhande ruzahita ruhishwa iyo urupapuro ruri mu buryo bwuzuye. Kubera imbogamizi za Chrome, uruhande ntirushobora kongera gufungurwa. Ugomba kongera gufungura uruhande ku giti cyawe!

coloredbackground.label: Inyuma y'amabara
coloredbackground.description: Iyo yemejwe, uruhande ruzerekana inyuma y'amabara

backgroundPicture.label: Ifoto y'inyuma
backgroundPicture.description: Kanda [+] kongeraho ifoto yihariye, kanda [-] gusiba ifoto yihariye. Ushobora kubona amafoto ukunda ku mbuga zikurikira.

backgroundColor.label: Ibara ry'inyuma
backgroundColor.description: Hitamo ibara ry'inyuma rya interface yawe.

backgroundGradient.label: Guhindura ibara ry'inyuma
backgroundGradient.description: Iyo yemejwe, ibara ry'inyuma rizakoreshwa mu guhindura ibara. Ushobora kandi guhindura inguni y'ibara ukoresheje slider.

backgroundImageBrightness.label: Uburenganzira
backgroundImageBrightness.description: Emeza uburenganzira, ushobora kumenyekana mu buryo bw'umunini w'uburanga

fluentOverlayScrollbars.label: Imiyoboro y'uburanga
fluentOverlayScrollbars.description: Koresha imiyoboro y'uburanga bwa Microsoft Fluent kandi uyishyire ku mbuga z'ububiko

showFullUrl.label: Reba URL nzima
showFullUrl.description: Uyuhejeje, URL nzima izaba irerekana hejuru y'itike ya tab

currentWindowOnly.label: Icyumba cy'ubu gusa
currentWindowOnly.description: Erekana gusa amapaji y'icyumba cy'ubu. Niba bidakora, amapaji yose azerekanwa

pinedTabsAsIcons.label: Erekana amapaji afatanye nk'ibimenyetso
pinedTabsAsIcons.description: Iyo yemejwe, amapaji afatanye azerekanwa nk'ibimenyetso kandi ntibizerekanwa mu rutonde

pinToQuickAccess.label: Erekana kwinjira byihuse
pinToQuickAccess.description: Urashobora gushyiraho tab kugirango yerekane muri Quick access kugirango byorohe kubibona. Kanda iburyo (cyangwa ukande igihe kirekire) hanyuma uhitemo Pin to Quick access. Kuyikuraho igihe utagikeneye aho ukanda iburyo (cyangwa ukande igihe kirekire) hanyuma uhitemo Gusiba muri Quick access. Itandukaniro riri hagati ya tabs zafashwe ni uko Quick Access ibika URL kandi igafungura tab nshya buri gihe iyo ikanditsweho.

selectFromHistory.label: Hitamo mu mateka
selectFromHistory.description: Niba ukeneye guhitamo mu mateka, uruhushya rwawe rurakenewe
selectFromHistory.selectItemsToAddToQuickAccess: Hitamo ibintu byo kongera muri quick access:
selectFromHistory.deniedMessage: Wanze uruhushya rukenewe, bityo igenamiterere ntiryahindutse. Niba uhinduye ibitekerezo, kanda kongera kandi wemere uruhushya

collapsedGroupShowTabIcons.label: Erekana ibimenyetso by'urubuga iyo itsinda ryegeranye
collapsedGroupShowTabIcons.description: Iyo yemejwe, amatsinda yegeranye azerekana ibimenyetso by'amapaji

hoverPreview.label: Reba mu gihe utembera
hoverPreview.description: Iyo yemejwe, gutembera hejuru y'amapaji bizerekana ibishushanyo by'amapaji

previewWithThumbnail.label: Erekana ibishushanyo mu kureba
previewWithThumbnail.description: Iyo yemejwe, ibishushanyo bizerekana ibishushanyo by'amapaji
previewWithThumbnail.alert: Fata ahantu hagaragara ku rupapuro ruriho muri icyumba cyihariye. Kugira ngo ukoreshe ubu buryo, kongeraho bigomba kugira uruhushya rwa <all_urls> cyangwa uruhushya rwa activeTab.
previewWithThumbnail.deniedMessage: Wanze uruhushya rukenewe, bityo igenamiterere ntiryahindutse. Niba uhinduye ibitekerezo, kanda kongera kandi wemere uruhushya

previewDelay.label: Gusubika kureba
previewDelay.description: Shyiraho igihe cyo gusubika kureba amapaji mu gihe utembera hejuru y'amapaji, n'ibindi. (amasegonda). Niba byashyizwe kuri 0, nta gusubika bizabaho

saveRecentlyTabs.label: Bika amapaji aheruka gufungwa
saveRecentlyTabs.description: Iyo yemejwe, bika amapaji aheruka gufungwa

dataSource.label: Inkomoko y'ibipimo
dataSource.alert: Kugira ngo ushakishe amateka, ukeneye uruhushya rwawe kugira ngo wemeze
dataSource.deniedMessage: Wanze uruhushya rukenewe, bityo igenamiterere ntiryahindutse. Niba uhinduye ibitekerezo, kanda kongera kandi wemere uruhushya

showInTabSearchResults.label: Erekana amateka mu bisubizo by'ubushakashatsi bw'amapaji
showInTabSearchResults.description: Iyo yemejwe, amateka aheruka azerekanwa mu bisubizo by'ubushakashatsi bw'amapaji

limitSearchResults.label: Gena umubare w'amateka mu bisubizo by'ubushakashatsi bw'amapaji
limitSearchResults.description: Shyiraho umubare w'amateka mu bisubizo by'ubushakashatsi bw'amapaji. Amateka arengeje umubare azasibwa
limitSearchResults.alert: Amateka menshi azagira ingaruka ku muvuduko wo gupakira urupapuro

saveRecentlyTabsLimit.label: Umubare w'amapaji aheruka gufungwa yo kubika
saveRecentlyTabsLimit.description: Shyiraho umubare w'amapaji aheruka gufungwa yo kubika

keepDays.label: Umubare w'iminsi yo kubika amapaji aheruka gufungwa
keepDays.description: Shyiraho umubare w'iminsi yo kubika amapaji aheruka gufungwa. Amakuru arengeje igihe azasibwa

openDuration.label: Igihe cyo gufungura
openDuration.description: Amapaji afunguwe igihe kirenze igihe cyashyizweho azabikwa gusa

shortcuts.alert: Iyi paji ni iyo kwerekana gusa. Kugira ngo uhindure inzira ngufi, nyamuneka jya kuri [Extensions]->[Manage Extensions]->[Keyboard Shortcuts]

tabSwitch.label: PIP ku guhindura urupapuro
tabSwitch.description: Injira mu PIP iyo uhinduye urupapuro rufite video itari mute

scrollSwitch.label: Hindura ku ifoto mu ifoto iyo utembera
scrollSwitch.description: Niba urupapuro ruriho rwerekana video kandi video itari mute kandi video iri hanze y'akarere kagaragara iyo utembera, izinjira mu ifoto mu ifoto.

userActivitionAlert.title: Gukangura umukozi birakenewe
userActivitionAlert.tips_1: Gukangura umukozi bivuze ko umukozi ari gukorana n'urupapuro
userActivitionAlert.tips_2: By'umwihariko, gukangura bitera ibihe byinjiza nk'ibi:
userActivitionAlert.tips_3: Icyitonderwa: Gukoresha uruziga rw'imbeba cyangwa gukoraho ntibizatera!
userActivitionAlert.tips_4: Niba ushaka ibindi bisobanuro, nyamuneka jya kuri:

tabGroupCollapseBehavior.label: Imyitwarire yo kugabanya itsinda ry'amapaji
tabGroupCollapseBehavior.description: Hindura imyitwarire yo kugabanya itsinda ry'amapaji ya Chrome
tabGroupCollapseBehavior.option_collapse_others: Erekana itsinda ririho kandi ugabanye ayandi

autoCreateOrJoinSameDomainGroup.label: Kwihutira gukora cyangwa kwinjira mu itsinda rimwe
autoCreateOrJoinSameDomainGroup.description: Iyo yemejwe, amapaji mashya azahita yinjira mu itsinda rimwe. Niba itsinda ritabaho, itsinda rishya rizakorwa

groupFilterOutPinnedTabs.label: Siba amapaji afatanye mu matsinda
groupFilterOutPinnedTabs.description: Iyo yemejwe, amapaji afatanye ntazongerwa mu matsinda

enableProgressBar.label: Emeza umurongo w'iterambere
enableProgressBar.description: Iyo yemejwe, umurongo w'iterambere ryo gusoma uzerekanwa munsi y'umutwe w'urupapuro

readingProgressBar.label: Umurongo w'iterambere ryo gusoma
readingProgressBar.description: Iyo yemejwe, umurongo w'iterambere ryo gusoma uzerekanwa munsi y'umutwe w'urupapuro

scrollHeightRatio.label: Igiti cy'urugero ry'uruzinduko
scrollHeightRatio.description: Igiti cy'urugero ry'uruzinduko ryo kubaho mu kibazo cy'urupapuro. Umurongo w'iterambere uzaba wemerewe iyo igiti cy'urugero cyahindutse

playingProgressBar.label: Umurongo w'iterambere ryo gukina
playingProgressBar.description: Iyo yemejwe, umurongo w'iterambere ryo gukina uzerekanwa munsi y'umutwe w'urupapuro

enableFloatBall.label: Emeza umupira w'urujya n'uruza
enableFloatBall.description: Iyo uruhande rufunze, umupira w'urujya n'uruza uzerekanwa ku ruhande rw'iburyo rw'urupapuro, utuma uruhande rufunguka vuba.

saveMemoryAction.label: Uko gutanga ububasha ku ibikoresho
saveMemoryAction.description: Kugira ububasha ku ibikoresho, waba ufite gahunda yo kugufunga ibikoresho cyangwa kugufata ibikoresho.
saveMemoryAction.discardTips: ibikoresho byafungwa ntibibuka aho. Dukira kandi bigenda byihutirwa ku kigero cy'ibikoresho cya Chrome. Muri iyi navigasiya, ijambo ry'ibikoresho, indangururamajwi n'ibindi byose birasabwa kubonwa no kubonanywa nk'uko byagenzurwa wakati wa navigasiya muri iyi bikoresho.

discardInactiveTabsMinutes.label: Igihe cyangwa kugufunga ibikoresho zikora
discardInactiveTabsMinutes.description: Muri iki gihe ntibyakozwe ibikoresho byo kugufunga ibikoresho ntibyakozwe, ibikoresho byofungwa byakozwe kuri iki gihe.

closeInactiveTabsMinutes.label: Igihe cyangwa kufunga ibikoresho zikora
closeInactiveTabsMinutes.description: Muri iki gihe ntibyakozwe ibikoresho byo kufunga ibikoresho ntibyakozwe, ibikoresho byofungwa byakozwe kuri iki gihe.

disableAnimations.label: Gufunga ibiganiro
disableAnimations.description: gufunga uburyo bwo gukora umurongo n'ubufatanye bwose

site.label: Ibitegeko by'itariki
site.name: Izina
site.totalStorageUsedBySites: Igiciro cyose cyo kuzindura data ku bitegeko

addNewSite.label: Emeza site nshya
addNewSite.description: Shyiramo urubuga rwawe rwa internet, nk'uko 'www.example.com', kandi kanda 'Emeza'.

browserSettings.label: Amakuru y'ibikoresho
browserSettings.description: Ukeneye guhindura ibikoresho by'ibikoresho, nkuko kugufunga ibikoresho cyangwa guhindura ibikoresho by'ibikoresho.

autoDiscardable.label: Auto discardable
autoDiscardable.description: Iyo yemejwe, ibikoresho byakoreshejwe kugufungwa n'ibrowiza, kandi iyo wakoresheje ububasha n'ibikoresho by'ibikoresho by'ibikoresho, ibikoresho byakoreshejwe kugufungwa aho bavugwa. Iyo yafungwa, ibikoresho ntibyakoreshejwe.

readingProgressBar.label: Ibikoresho by'umurongo w'ukurikira
readingProgressBar.description: Iyo yemejwe, ibikoresho by'umurongo w'ukurikira byakoreshejwe kuri ruhande rw'ibikoresho.
readingProgressBar.globaldisabledTips: Ukeneye gukora ibikoresho by'umurongo w'ukurikira mu mabwiriza meza kugirango uhindure iyi settinga.

playingProgressBar.label: Ibikoresho by'umurongo w'ukurikira
playingProgressBar.description: Iyo yemejwe, ibikoresho by'umurongo w'ukurikira byakoreshejwe kuri ruhande rw'ibikoresho.
playingProgressBar.globaldisabledTips: Ukeneye gukora ibikoresho by'umurongo w'ukurikira mu mabwiriza meza kugirango uhindure iyi settinga.

tabSwitchPip.label: PIP kuri Tab Switch
tabSwitchPip.description: Iyo yemejwe, auto-enter Picture-in-picture iyo wakoresheje ibikoresho n'umunyamakuru w'umuziki ushaka.
tabSwitchPip.globaldisabledTips: Ibyo wakoresheje Picture-in-picture mu byerekeye ibikoresho byose kugirango ushobore guhindura iyi settinga.

clearHistoyAfterCLose.label: Siba istoriya aho ifunga
clearHistoyAfterCLose.description: Iyo yemejwe, istoriya izasibwa aho ifunga ibikoresho.

SyncTabs.label: Synchronize tabs
SyncTabs.description: Hitamo iki gusinzira amakuru ya vichupo, nkuko ibikurikira: ibikorwa by'ibikorerwa ku itegeko, amakuru y'ibitabo by'ibikorerwa ku murwa, amakuru y'ubutumwa bw'ikoranabuhanga, n'ibindi.
SyncTabs.globaldisabledTips: Ibyo wakoresheje gusinzira mu byerekeye ibikoresho byose kugirango ushobore guhindura iyi settinga.

SyncPrivateData.label: Synchronize amakuru abantu
SyncPrivateData.description: Hitamo iki gusinzira amakuru abantu, nkuko ibikurikira: ibikorwa by'ibikorerwa ku itegeko, amakuru y'ibitabo by'ibikorerwa ku murwa, amakuru y'ubutumwa bw'ikoranabuhanga, n'ibindi. Amakuru azasinzirwa buri gihe.
SyncPrivateData.globaldisabledTips: Ibyo wakoresheje gusinzira mu byerekeye ibikoresho byose kugirango ushobore guhindura iyi settinga.

linkSettings.label: Ibyo Guhuza
linkSettings.description: Shyiraho uburyo links zigomba gufatwa kuri uru rubuga.
linkSettings.listTips: Kanda hanyuma ukure hasi cyangwa hejuru kugirango utegure. Amategeko afite agaciro kanini ashyirwa hejuru. Iyo itegeko rihuye, andi mategeko ntakoreshwa.
linkSettings.linkMatchContentTips: Byemera imvugo zikoreshwa kenshi. Urugero, ukoreshe '*' kugirango uhure n'inyuguti zose cyangwa '?' kugirango uhure n'inyuguti imwe.

importAndExport.title: Kwinjiza/Gusohora

options.preferencesInfo: Birimo guhindura ibikoresho by'ibanze, guhindura ibikoresho by'ibikoresho, no guhindura insanganyamatsiko y'uburyo bwo gukoresha.
options.quickAccessWarning: Ikirangantego cy'urubuga rutari rwigeze gusurwa gishobora kugaragara nabi. Ntugire ikibazo, kizagaragara neza nyuma yo gusura no kongera gufungura umubrowiza.
options.siteConfigInfo: nko kuba auto discardable, picture-in-picture kuri Tab Switch, umurongo w'ukurikira, umurongo w'ukurikira, n'ibindi.

importAndExport.fileError: Ikosa ryo gusesengura dosiye, nyamuneka shyiramo dosiye ya JSON ikwiye

SyncConfigs.label: Sinzibire amakuru
SyncConfigs.description: Hitamo iki gusinzira ibikorwa bya iyi nkuru.

SyncTabs.label: Sinzibire vichupo
SyncTabs.description: Hitamo iki gusinzira amakuru ya vichupo, nkuko ibikurikira: ibikorwa by'ibikorerwa ku itegeko, amakuru y'ibitabo by'ibikorerwa ku murwa, amakuru y'ubutumwa bw'ikoranabuhanga, n'ibindi.

OpenOrCloseTabsSynchronously.label: Fungua ama funga vichupo kwa ushirikiano
OpenOrCloseTabsSynchronously.description: Ukiwezesha, kufungua au kufunga vichupo katika vivinjari tofauti kutasawazishwa. Hii inatumika tu wakati chaguo la 'baki kusawazishwa' limeamilishwa
OpenOrCloseTabsSynchronously.OpenOrCloseTabsSynchronouslyWarning: Ikiwa utaingia kwenye akaunti moja kwenye vivinjari viwili kwa wakati mmoja na kuwasha chaguo hili, kufungua au kufunga vichupo katika kivinjari kimoja kutatekeleza operesheni ileile kwenye kivinjari kingine. Ikiwa tovuti inazuia kuingia mara kwa mara kwa akaunti ileile, kunaweza kutokea mafungu.

SyncPrivateData.label: Igurisha amakuru abantu
SyncPrivateData.description: Hitamo iki gusinzira amakuru abantu, nkuko ibikurikira: ibikorwa by'ibikorerwa ku itegeko, amakuru y'ibitabo by'ibikorerwa ku murwa, amakuru y'ubutumwa bw'ikoranabuhanga, n'ibindi. Amakuru azasinzirwa buri gihe.

screenSizeTips.pageSidebarRelase: Amakuru meza! Twashyizeho ikiranga gishya cya 'Page Sidebar' kigufasha kongera paneli y'uruhande ku mbuga za web utarinze gukoresha paneli y'uruhande y'imbere muri browser. Iyo yemejwe, unyura ku nkengero za ecran ukoresheje imbeba kugira ngo ugaragaze paneli y'uruhande. [Reba Ibyo Guhitamo](/options.html#/tabSidebarOnPages)
screenSizeTips.screenSizeWarningMessage:
Twabonye ko umwanzuro wa ecran yawe ushobora kugira ingaruka ku buryo ukoresha paneli y'uruhande. Kubera imipaka ya browser, ubugari buke bwa paneli y'uruhande ni 360 pixels. Ku mwanzuro wawe w'ubu, paneli y'uruhande ishobora gufata {{percent}}% ya ecran yawe.

Kugira ngo wongere uburyo ukoresha, tekereza guhindura umwanzuro wa ecran yawe. Dore inzira zishobora kugufasha:

- Kubakoresha Windows: [Hindura umwanzuro wa ecran muri Windows](https://support.microsoft.com/windows/5effefe3-2eac-e306-0b5d-2073b765876b)
- Kubakoresha Mac: [Hindura umwanzuro wa ecran ya Mac](https://support.apple.com/guide/mac-help/mchl86d72b76)

Nyamuneka hindura gusa niba ari ngombwa ku bw'uburyo ukoresha.
screenSizeTips.scaleWarningMessage: Igipimo cyawe cya ecran kiri kuri {{scale}}%. Igipimo kinini gituma ibice bya interface biba binini ariko kigabanya umwanya uboneka. Kugabanya igipimo bizerekana ibikubiyemo byinshi ariko bigabanye ubunini bw'ibice. Nyamuneka hitamo igipimo kibereye uburyo bwo gusoma no gukoresha.

tabSidebarOnPages.title: Paneli y'uruhande ku rupapuro
tabSidebarOnPages.description: Ibiranga paneli y'uruhande ku rupapuro bigufasha kongera paneli y'uruhande ku mbuga za web utarinze gufungura paneli y'uruhande y'imbere muri browser. Ibi birafasha cyane abakoresha bafite ecrans ntoya basanga paneli y'uruhande ya browser ari nini cyane cyangwa idahinduka. Nubwo paneli y'uruhande ku rupapuro itanga imikorere mike kubera imipaka runaka, itanga ubundi buryo buto. Iyo yemejwe, ushobora kugera kuri paneli y'uruhande unyuze ku nkengero za ecran.

sidebarEnabled.label: Emeza Paneli y'uruhande
sidebarEnabled.description: Hindura kugira ngo wemeze cyangwa uhagarike paneli y'uruhande ku rupapuro

sidebarPosition.label: Umwanya wa Paneli y'uruhande
sidebarPosition.description: Hitamo aho paneli y'uruhande igaragara ku rupapuro

contentScriptWarning.warningMessage: Scripts y'ibikubiyemo ni porogaramu ntoya zongerera imbuga za web imikorere y'inyongera. Ariko, kubera imipaka y'umutekano n'ubuzima bwite, izi scripts ntizishobora gukora ku bwoko runaka bw'amaso. Kubera iyo mpamvu, paneli y'uruhande ishobora kutagaragara kuri ibi bikurikira:
contentScriptWarning.webStore: Amasoko ya browser y'inyongera (urugero, Chrome Web Store, Microsoft Edge Add-ons)
contentScriptWarning.internalPages: Amaso y'imbere muri browser (atangira na chrome://, edge://, cyangwa about://)
contentScriptWarning.fileUrls: Amadosiye y'imbere muri mudasobwa yawe (atangira na file://)
contentScriptWarning.extensionsPages: Amaso y'inyongera za browser (atangira na chrome-extension:// cyangwa extension:// cyangwa bisa)
contentScriptWarning.protectedPages: Imbuga za web zifite Politiki y'umutekano w'ibikubiyemo ikomeye
contentScriptWarning.newTabPage: Amaso ya New Tab (atangira na chrome://newtab/ cyangwa edge://newtab/ cyangwa bisa)

snapshots.title: Reba Snapshots
snapshots.snapshotImportFailedDuplicate: Injiza Snapshot yanze, Snapshot isanzwe ihari
